alert.note: Alert for Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 12:55AM CST until February 16 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CST FOR WEBSTER AND WESTERN WRIGHT COUNTIES... At 1255 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marshfield to near Niangua to 6 miles southwest of Mansfield, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marshfield, Seymour, Mansfield, Niangua, Duncan, Diggins, Rader, Grovespring, Odin and Northview. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 94 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
